name: The Mystery of the Colorful Glasses
name_original: The Mystery of the Colorful Glasses
description:
The story

You found mysterious glasses with a note containing an address for an old house. You are curious what can be found there. And when you're inside the house - you must solve the mystery behind it.

If you're stuck - download the walkthrough! :)

Controls

Moving: Up, Down, Left, Right Arrows

Inventory usage: 1-6 alphanumerical

Interaction: Ctrl

Info

The game is being developed, please follow for actual status: @palys_plays

This game was originaly created for Ludum Dare #35, theme 'Shapeshift'
